mapper.insert: insert into t_order_info (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TRANS_ID, MEMBER_TRANS_DATE, PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_MONEY, TRADE_NO, ORDER_STATUS, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY) values ( #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberTransId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberTransDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update t_order_info
